channel.title: [PJA-Hyperion] The npcDefinitionsEPICSHIT1337.xml Problem [PJA-Hyperion]
channel.description:
Alright, this will show you how to get rid of that problem. This is what the problem should look like.
[code]Apr 7, 2010 7:57:22 AM org.hyperion.Server main INFO: Starting Hyperion... Apr 7, 2010 7:57:22 AM org.hyperion.rs2.model.GameObjectDefinition init INFO: Loading definitions... Apr 7, 2010 7:57:23 AM org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer bind INFO: Binding to port : 43595... Apr 7, 2010 7:57:23 AM org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer bind INFO: Binding to port : 8080... Apr 7, 2010 7:57:23 AM org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer start INFO: Ready Apr 7, 2010 7:57:23 AM org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server bind INFO: Binding to port : 43594... Apr 7, 2010 7:57:25 AM org.hyperion.rs2.model.GameObjectDefinition init INFO: Loaded 25374 object definitions. Apr 7, 2010 7:57:25 AM org.hyperion.rs2.ScriptManager <init> INFO: Loading scripts... Apr 7, 2010 7:57:25 AM org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server start INFO: Waiting for pending background loading tasks... Apr 7, 2010 7:57:26 AM org.hyperion.rs2.model.ObjectManager load INFO: Loading definitions... Apr 7, 2010 7:57:26 AM org.hyperion.rs2.model.ObjectManager load INFO: Loaded 14974 object definitions. Apr 7, 2010 7:57:26 AM org.hyperion.rs2.model.ObjectManager load INFO: Loading map... Apr 7, 2010 7:57:29 AM org.hyperion.rs2.model.ObjectManager load INFO: Loaded 1376518 objects. Apr 7, 2010 7:57:29 AM org.hyperion.rs2.model.ItemDefinition init INFO: Loading definitions... Apr 7, 2010 7:57:44 AM org.hyperion.rs2.model.ItemDefinition init INFO: Loaded 11525 definitions Apr 7, 2010 7:57:47 AM org.hyperion.Server main SEVERE: Error starting Hyperion. java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException: java.io.FileNotFoundException: d:\npcDefinitionsEPICSHIT1337.xml (The device is not ready) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerGet(FutureTask.java:222) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.get(FutureTask.java:83) at org.hyperion.util.BlockingExecutorService.waitForPendingTasks(BlockingExecutorService.java:50) at org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server.start(RS2Server.java:74) at org.hyperion.Server.main(Server.java:36) Caused by: java.io.FileNotFoundException: d:\npcDefinitionsEPICSHIT1337.xml (The device is not ready) at java.io.FileOutputStream.openAppend(Native Method) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(FileOutputStream.java:177) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(FileOutputStream.java:102) at java.io.FileWriter.<init>(FileWriter.java:61) at org.hyperion.rs2.model.NPCDefinition.init(NPCDefinition.java:107) at org.hyperion.rs2.model.World$4.call(World.java:139) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerRun(FutureTask.java:303) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(FutureTask.java:138) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.runTask(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:886) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:908) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) Apr 7, 2010 7:57:47 AM org.hyperion.rs2.content.DialogueLoader init INFO: Loaded 17 dialogue sets. [/code]
MUCH EASIER WAY TO DO THIS:
Way 1: Just search all files (using Eclipse) for "npcDefinitionsEPICSHIT1337". Replace the whole destination to the same npcDefinitions.xml in your data folder. Bam. Done.
Credits: John.
Way 2:
This means that you probobly don't have a D drive, or the file that was suppose to be downloaded into there (in this case, npcDefinitionsEPICSHIT1337.xml) wasn't downloaded correctly. So, this is what you have to do to fix this problem:
Download the file here: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?ikmfqydmjdt]http://www.mediafire.com/?ikmfqydmjdt[/url] (Yeah I know, its 106mb, but I mean, do you want your server to work?)
If you have a D: drive, then put the file there and your done. If you don't, keep following the tutorial.
Go to [code]src/org/hyperion/rs2/model[/code] Then open NPCDefinition.java.
Ctrl+f search for [code]EPICSHIT1337[/code]
Change the direction to where you put the file, in my case I would have put it in my C drive (you can put it anywhere, as long as its a place you can refer the run file). So, now change the statement to this:
PrintWriter p = new PrintWriter(new FileWriter("c:/npcDefinitionsEPICSHIT1337.xml", true));
And viola! Your run.bat should work now. Any problems, just post under here.
Credits: [code]CoderNexus - Making the tutorial. The Hyperion team - Making the server. Most go to Graham.[/code]

item.description:
@ownage_milk wrote:

I get this error any help?? pleaseee

Jul 13, 2010 8:35:33 PM org.hyperion.Server main INFO: Starting Hyperion... Jul 13, 2010 8:35:33 PM org.hyperion.rs2.model.GameObjectDefinition init INFO: Loading definitions... Jul 13, 2010 8:35:33 PM org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer bind INFO: Binding to port : 43595... Jul 13, 2010 8:35:33 PM org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer bind INFO: Binding to port : 8080... Jul 13, 2010 8:35:33 PM org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer start INFO: Ready Jul 13, 2010 8:35:33 PM org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server bind INFO: Binding to port : 43594... Jul 13, 2010 8:35:34 PM org.hyperion.rs2.ScriptManager <init> INFO: Loading scripts... Jul 13, 2010 8:35:34 PM org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server start INFO: Waiting for pending background loading tasks... Jul 13, 2010 8:35:36 PM org.hyperion.rs2.model.GameObjectDefinition init INFO: Loaded 25374 object definitions. Jul 13, 2010 8:35:36 PM org.hyperion.Server main SEVERE: Error starting Hyperion. java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException: org.hyperion.cache.InvalidCacheExceptio n: No index files present. at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerGet(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.get(Unknown Source) at org.hyperion.util.BlockingExecutorService.waitForPendingTasks(Blockin gExecutorService.java:50) at org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server.start(RS2Server.java:74) at org.hyperion.Server.main(Server.java:36) Caused by: org.hyperion.cache.InvalidCacheException: No index files present. at org.hyperion.cache.Cache.<init>(Cache.java:75) at org.hyperion.rs2.model.ObjectManager.load(ObjectManager.java:44) at org.hyperion.rs2.model.World$2.call(World.java:125) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerRun(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.runTask(Unknown Source ) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Jul 13, 2010 8:35:36 PM org.hyperion.rs2.model.ItemDefinition init INFO: Loading definitions... Press any key to continue . . .

item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

Hyperion is 377, not 459. P Annihilation was turned into a 459.

Also good job, Hyperion is a nice base, but for newer people it is just to far out of there reach to understand without knowing a decent amount of Java. There are bases out there that have many of the Hyperion features but packaged nicely for newer members.
